title: Non-verbal hypnosis in the lift / Dr. Marco Paret
description:
In todays video Dr. Marco Paret will demonstrate you a technique for doing hypnosis in the elevator. Non-verbal hypnotic states in the lift can be achieved very easy and they can be very strong, because the space is smaller and the subject feels like it is shifting from the ground. Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.

Check out some other videos with our students  on our channel:
